alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:21PM MDT until June 15 at 12:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1245 PM MDT. * At 1221 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granada, or 15 miles east of Lamar, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hartman and Bristol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
